Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System Aztreonam (0.5-64 µg/mL)
BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System Aztreonam (0.5-64 µg/mL) - Gram-Negative ID/AST or AST only
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Isolates from pure culture of aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria of human origin
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System with aztreonam (0.5-64 µg/mL) antimicrobial susceptibility testing for Gram-negative bacteria
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of most Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria isolates and most Gram-positive isolates from pure culture, using aztreonam (0.5-64 µg/mL) in Gram-negative ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels
